comment_0: It doesn't matter who covers this track, it belongs to Burl...heart and soul. Christmas (for me, anyway) would not be Christmas w/o the Burls, Bings, Andrews, Coles, Martin's, the large choirs, etc. They came at a time when life moved slower, choices were more limited, family was more important, modern technology was only just beginning, so songs (especially holiday songs) really mattered.
